com.rscja.deviceapi

Class RFIDWithISO14443A4CPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rscja.deviceapi.RFIDWithISO14443A4CPU

  • public class RFIDWithISO14443A4CPU
extends java.lang.Object
    RFID模块ISO14443A CPU卡协议操作类
    RFID Module ISO1443A CPU card protocol class

    注意：
    1、使用前请确认您的机器已安装此模块。
    2、要正常使用模块需要在\libs\armeabi\目录放置libDeviceAPI.so文件
    3、在操作设备前需要调用 init() 打开设备，使用完后调用 free() 关闭设备
    Note: ?* 1, Please confirm that your machine has installed this module before use.
    ?* 2, For the normal use of the module need to place the libDeviceAPI.so file under below path :\ libs \ armeabi \ directory.
    ?* 3, Before the use of the device need to call open the device, use the call /> to close the device.

    Author:
    liuruifeng
